purpose: To provide a platform for creating and deploying custom AI assistants that enhance productivity and streamline various workflows.
principle: Built on a modular architecture with support for large language models, allowing users to create tailored AI solutions.
reusability: Highly modular and customizable, with APIs for integration into existing systems and workflows.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include limited features and potential stability issues.
name: dust
description: Custom AI assistant platform to speed up your work.
highlight: Customizable AI assistant platform designed to enhance productivity and streamline workflows.
